name: Patient
definition: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual receiving care or other health-related services.

name: Practitioner
definition: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

name: PractitionerRole
definition: A specific set of Roles/Locations/specialties/services that a practitioner may perform at an organization for a period of time.

name: RelatedPerson
definition: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of care themselves.

name: Person
definition: Demographics and administrative information about a person independent of a specific health-related context.

name: Group
definition: Represents a defined collection of individuals, devices, or other entities.

name: Organization
definition: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action.

name: OrganizationAffiliation
definition: Defines an affiliation/assotiation/relationship between 2 organizations, that is not a part-of relationship.

name: HealthcareService
definition: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

name: Endpoint
definition: The technical details of an endpoint that can be used for electronic services.

name: Location
definition: Details and position information for a physical place.

name: Substance
definition: A homogeneous material with a definite composition.

name: BiologicallyDerivedProduct
definition: A material substance originating from a biological entity.

name: Device
definition: A type of item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

name: DeviceMetric
definition: Describes a measurement, calculation or setting capability of a medical device.

name: Task
definition: A task to be performed.

name: Appointment
definition: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

name: AppointmentResponse
definition: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection.

name: Schedule
definition: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments.

name: Slot
definition: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments.

name: VerificationResult
definition: Describes the result of verifying the existence of and connectivity to a FHIR net-work.

name: Contract
definition: A formal agreement between parties.

name: Account
definition: Tracks balance, charges, credits, and transfers.

name: Invoice
definition: A request for payment for goods and services rendered.

name: ChargeItemDefinition
definition: The properties of a billing code to be used in charge item resources.

name: Encounter
definition: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

name: EpisodeOfCare
definition: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

name: Flag
definition: A warning that is relevant to the care of a patient.

name: List
definition: A curated collection of resources.

name: Library
definition: Represents a library of quality improvement components.

name: Composition
definition: A set of resources composed into a single coherent clinical statement, such as a discharge summary.

name: DocumentReference
definition: A reference to a document of any kind for any purpose. Provides metadata about the document.

name: DocumentManifest
definition: A list of documents that are related to each other, and which maybe treated as a whole.

name: CatalogEntry
definition: An entry in a catalog.

name: AllergyIntolerance
definition: Risk of harmful reaction to a substance.

name: AdverseEvent
definition: An event resulting in unintended harm to a patient or another person.

name: Condition
definition: A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

name: Procedure
definition: An action that is or was performed on or for a patient. This can be a physical intervention like a surgery, or less invasive like providing counseling.

name: FamilyMemberHistory
definition: Significant health conditions for a person's family members.

name: ClinicalImpression
definition: A record of a clinical assessment performed to determine what problem(s) may affect the patient.

name: DetectedIssue
definition: Identifies and records issues that have been detected.

name: CarePlan
definition: A plan of care for a patient.

name: CareTeam
definition: The people and organizations who are involved in the care of a patient.

name: Goal
definition: A desired outcome for a patient.

name: ServiceRequest
definition: A request for a service to be performed.

name: NutritionOrder
definition: A request to supply a diet, formula, or nutritional supplement to a patient.

name: VisionPrescription
definition: A prescription for glasses or contact lenses.

name: RiskAssessment
definition: An assessment of the potential risk of future harm to a patient.

name: RequestGroup
definition: A group of related requests.

name: Communication
definition: A record of a request for information or an action.

name: CommunicationRequest
definition: A request to convey information.

name: DeviceRequest
definition: A request for a patient to use or be given a device.

name: DeviceUseStatement
definition: A record of a device being used by a patient.

name: GuidanceResponse
definition: The result of a guidance request.

name: Observation
definition: Measurements and simple assertions made about a patient, device, or other subject.

name: Media
definition: A photo, video, or audio recording.

name: DiagnosticReport
definition: A summary of the results of a diagnostic service.

name: Specimen
definition: A sample of tissue or fluid taken from a patient.

name: BodyStructure
definition: Record of an anatomical structure.

name: ImagingStudy
definition: A set of images produced in single study.

name: QuestionnaireResponse
definition: A structured set of questions and answers.

name: MolecularSequence
definition: A sequence of nucleotides or amino acids.

name: Medication
definition: Definition of a medication.

name: MedicationAdministration
definition: A record of a medication being administered to a patient.

name: MedicationDispense
definition: A record of a medication being dispensed to a patient.

name: MedicationKnowledge
definition: Definition of a medication including its form, strength, and packaging.

name: MedicationRequest
definition: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.

name: MedicationStatement
definition: A record of a medication that is being taken by a patient.

name: Immunization
definition: A record of an immunization event.

name: ImmunizationEvaluation
definition: A record of an evaluation of an immunization event.

name: ImmunizationRecommendation
definition: A recommendation for an immunization.

name: Claim
definition: A provider's submission of a request for payment to a payer for health care services.

name: ClaimResponse
definition: A response to a claim.

name: ChargeItem
definition: A record of a charge for a good or service.

name: Coverage
definition: Financial instrument which may be used to reimburse or pay for health care products and services.

name: CoverageEligibilityRequest
definition: A request to determine if a patient is eligible for coverage.

name: CoverageEligibilityResponse
definition: A response to a request to determine if a patient is eligible for coverage.

name: EnrollmentRequest
definition: A request to enroll a patient in a health plan.

name: EnrollmentResponse
definition: A response to a request to enroll a patient in a health plan.

name: PaymentNotice
definition: A notice of a payment.

name: PaymentReconciliation
definition: A record of a payment reconciliation.

name: ExplanationOfBenefit
definition: An explanation of a benefit.

name: InsurancePlan
definition: Details of a health insurance product/plan.

name: ResearchStudy
definition: A process of investigation that involves subjects and which is designed to answer a scientific question.

name: ResearchSubject
definition: A person or animal that is the subject of a research study.

name: Measure
definition: A quality measure.

name: MeasureReport
definition: A report of a quality measure.

name: TestScript
definition: A set of instructions for testing a system.

name: TestReport
definition: A report of a test.

name: MedicinalProduct
definition: Detailed information for a medicinal product.

name: MedicinalProductAuthorization
definition: The regulatory authorization of a medicinal product.

name: MedicinalProductContraindication
definition: The clinical particulars - contraindications.

name: MedicinalProductIndication
definition: The clinical particulars - indications.

name: MedicinalProductInteraction
definition: The clinical particulars - interactions.

name: MedicinalProductManufactured
definition: The manufactured item as contained in the packaged medicinal product.

name: MedicinalProductPackaged
definition: A medicinal product in a container or package.

name: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical
definition: A pharmaceutical product described in terms of its composition and dose form.

name: MedicinalProductUndesirableEffect
definition: The clinical particulars - undesirable effects.

name: SubstanceNucleicAcid
definition: Nucleic acids are defined by three distinct elements: the base, sugar and linkage.

name: SubstancePolymer
definition: Properties of a substance polymer.

name: SubstanceProtein
definition: A substance protein.

name: SubstanceReferenceInformation
definition: Todo.

name: SubstanceSourceMaterial
definition: Source material for a substance.

name: SubstanceSpecification
definition: The specification of a substance.

name: AuditEvent
definition: A record of an event for purposes of security analysis.

name: Consent
definition: A record of a patient's consent.

name: Provenance
definition: A record of the origin of a resource.

name: CapabilityStatement
definition: A statement of the capabilities of a FHIR server.

name: StructureDefinition
definition: A definition of a FHIR structure.

name: ImplementationGuide
definition: A set of rules about how FHIR resources are used.

name: SearchParameter
definition: A search parameter that can be used to search for resources.

name: MessageDefinition
definition: A definition of a message that can be exchanged between systems.

name: OperationDefinition
definition: A definition of an operation that can be performed on a resource.

name: CompartmentDefinition
definition: A definition of a compartment.

name: StructureMap
definition: A map from one set of structures to another.

name: GraphDefinition
definition: A formal computable definition of a graph of resources.

name: ExampleScenario
definition: An example of a FHIR message exchange.

name: CodeSystem
definition: A set of codes that can be used in a FHIR resource.

name: ValueSet
definition: A set of codes that can be used in a FHIR resource.

name: ConceptMap
definition: A map from one set of codes to another.

name: NamingSystem
definition: A system of unique identifiers for resources.

name: TerminologyCapabilities
definition: A statement of the capabilities of a terminology server.

name: Bundle
definition: A container for a collection of resources.

name: Binary
definition: A resource that contains any kind of data in a binary format.

name: Basic
definition: A resource that can be used to represent any concept that does not have a defined resource type.

name: MessageHeader
definition: The header of a message.

name: OperationOutcome
definition: The result of an operation.

name: Parameters
definition: A resource that contains a set of parameters.

name: Subscription
definition: A subscription to a resource.

name: Questionnaire
definition: A structured set of questions.

name: PlanDefinition
definition: The definition of a plan for a series of actions, independent of any specific patient or context.

name: ActivityDefinition
definition: This resource allows for the definition of some activity to be performed, independent of a particular patient, practitioner, or other performance context.

name: DeviceDefinition
definition: The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

name: EventDefinition
definition: The EventDefinition resource provides a reusable description of when a particular event can occur.

name: ObservationDefinition
definition: Set of definitional characteristics for a kind of observation or measurement produced or consumed by an orderable health care service.

name: SpecimenDefinition
definition: A kind of specimen with associated set of requirements.
